entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7 except plus 1 in a few localities.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7 except plus 1 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Monday 20 March 2023
